summary: During the crypto gold rush, Idris Elba says he turned down a lot of “mad opportunities.” Now he has partnered with the “crypto-for-good” Stellar Development Foundation.
title: Idris Elba Is Ready to Talk About Crypto
detailed_content: IDRIS ELBA LEARNED about crypto at the same time as almost everyone else: when prices went through the roof. The British actor and filmmaker, best known for his roles in TV series The Wire and Luther, watched on during the pandemic as his celebrity peers tried to get in on the action.
author: BY JOEL KHALILI
